subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Coach Greg Ryan made a late change in goal for the semifinal against Brazil, opting to play Briana Scurry, who made the decisive save in the 1999 World Cup.
snippet: Coach Greg Ryan made a late change in goal for the semifinal against Brazil, opting to play Briana Scurry, who made the decisive save in the 1999 World Cup.
